Class FileNewsrc

  • java.lang.Object
    • gnu.inet.nntp.FileNewsrc
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Newsrc

    public class FileNewsrc
extends java.lang.Object
implements Newsrc
    A .newsrc configuration on a filesystem.
